Package BoringGame

Class Loader

java.lang.Object
BoringGame.Loader
public abstract class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class used for file manipulation.

    • loadPathToRectangle

      public static void loadPathToRectangle​(java.lang.String directory, java.lang.String file, org.jsfml.graphics.RectangleShape rectangle, org.jsfml.graphics.Texture texture)
      Allows user to load an image innto a specific rectangle
      Parameters:
      directory - directory in which the file can be found
      file - file to be used
      rectangle - rectangle to add file to
      texture - texture to allow drawing on that rectangle

      texture - texture to allow drawing on that rectangle

      Parameters:
      font - Font variable in which the font will be stored
      filePath - path to the font file

      Function clears the content of the specified file.
      Parameters:

    • addToFile

      public static void addToFile​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String fileName)
      Function used to add to a file.
      Parameters:
      text - String - The text that is being added to the file.
      fileName - String - The path to the file that is being added to.
